g.text: Loads the result into the _minSaltSizesMap variable
A map of hash names with the minimum salt sizes, in bytes.
Loads the result into the _srpParametersFilename variable
Returns the SRP parameters file name location
Loads SRP group parameters (N, g, hashName) from JSON file
HTTP POST /srp/register/init (First message of the registration process)
Loads the result into the salt variable
Build JSON reply to the client
response with the fields: clientId, groupId,
groupName, primeN, generatorG, sha and salt
HTTP POST /srp/register/complete (Last message of the registration process)
extract client's v parameter as extractedVHex
HTTP POST /srp/auth/init (First message of the authentication process)
[generate random candidate until n in the range [1, N-1] and at least minPrivateKeyBits]
response with a confirmation message with the
